resources.string:
Version 0.9.41

- Some code cleanups
- Downgraded Kotlin to 1.4.10

Version 0.9.40

- Removed some permissions from AndroidManifest.xml

Version 0.9.39

- Some code cleanups

Version 0.9.38

- Fixed Crash when taking photos

Version 0.9.37

- Use ActivityResultLauncher for EditKnittingDetailsFragment

Version 0.9.36

- Removed sharing photos

Version 0.9.35

- Rewrote Dropbox Import / Export with WorkManager

Version 0.9.34

- Added tests
- Upgrade Kotlin to 1.6.10
- Added dependencies
- Stopwatch now uses fragment

Version 0.9.33

- Rewrote dropbox export using WorkManager
- Fixed needle length

Version 0.9.32

- Rewrote compress photos using WorkManager
- Dropbox import / export works again

Version 0.9.31

- Fixed project count

Version 0.9.30

- Updated library versions

Version 0.9.29

- Improved layout of stopwatch activity
- Row counter and project count now work on Android 4.x
- Log out from Dropbox works now
- Improved Dropbox error handling
- Needle list can now be filtered
- Dropbox import / export works again on Android 4.x
- Category list is now sorted

Version 0.9.28

- Updated stopwatch activity

Version 0.9.27

- Updated date dialog
- Project list now longer shows image before actual list is displayed
- Deleting selected category in selet category activity no longer breaks database

Version 0.9.26

- Fixed row counter bug

Version 0.9.25

- Improved performance of row counter

Version 0.9.24

- Added row counter
- Fixed crashes that sometimes happend when rotating phone
- Improved design of project counter

Version 0.9.23

- Only replace photo with compressed photo if size is actually smaller
- Check if photo exists when exporting to Dropbox

Version 0.9.22

- Improved Dropbox export and import
- Fixed cut-off status icon

Version 0.9.21

- Rewritten Dropbox export and import
- Added possibility to compress existing photos

Version 0.9.20

- Knitting details display no longer cuts off text next to image
- Knitting details image is now smaller on devices with 18:9 aspect ratio

Version 0.9.19

- Updated application icon

Version 0.9.18

- Removed take photo action from edit knitting display
- Reworked settings screen
- Knitting details screen no longer truncates long texts
- Knittling list now uses placeholder image if no preview image is defined

Version 0.9.17

- Bugfixes
- Reworked knitting details display

Version 0.9.16

- Set different photo as preview if photo used as preview is deleted
- Deleting new categories no longer crashes the app
- Deleting new needles no longer crashes the app
- Import from gallery now works on older Android versions
- Show icon when selecting status

Version 0.9.15

- Improved photo gallery
- Imported photos are now also downsized and compressed

Version 0.9.14

- Many database operations are executed asynchronously
- New placeholder image for empty needles list
- New photos are now downsized and compressed to less than 200 KB

Version 0.9.13

- Many bug fixes
- New placeholder image for empty categories list
- Background image for categories list

Version 0.9.12

- Added Whats New dialog
- Changes can now be discarded
- New app icon
- New placeholder image for empty knitting list
